Description: Pottery ostracon bearing 8 lines of Greek text containing a magical text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Bibliographic references: Adams 2002 / Merinarti III: The Late and Terminal Christian Phases (118, pl. 38a)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395070) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395070)
